author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Snapchat: Shahid Kapoor has just discovered Snapchat and he is addicted to it
text:
After teasing his fans with some serious hotbod clicks, Shahid Kapoor is now having a gala time on his Snapchat account. The new dad has pulled out all stops to record some rather fun Snapchat videos of himself. Sharing videos and pictures from his ID: shhh , the actor is fast becoming very popular on the social networking app. Some videos posted by him are a total laugh riot. 

On the work front, Shahid is looking forward to the release of 'Rangoon' also starring Kangana Ranaut and Saif Ali Khan, on February 24. Since the film's promotions are keeping him very busy, the actor has taken to Snapchat to unwind between promotions. Check out Shahid's Snapchat posts: 

A post shared by Shahid Kapoor (@shahidkapoor) on Feb 20, 2017 at 8:27am PST 
A post shared by Shahid Kapoor (@shahidkapoor) on Feb 20, 2017 at 8:26am PST 
#rangooning on no sleep.

#rangooning
